title: N.B. RCMP report sees increases in fatal crashes, drug offences
description: The New Brunswick RCMP reported increases for 2024 in fatal collisions, mental health calls as well as cocaine and fentanyl offences.
content:
The New Brunswick RCMP's 2024 report shows increases in fatal crashes, mental health calls as well as a sharp increase in cocaine and fentanyl offences.
Cpl. Matthew Leblanc-Smith said the 18.5 per … [+2858 chars]
